sentences.en: A darkroom can become a very sloppy place to work in.
sentences.cn: 暗室由于经常在里面工作,会变得非常潮湿.

sentences.en: Ann was dressed in a sloppy brown sweater.
sentences.cn: 安穿了一件邋遢的棕色羊毛衫。

sentences.en: Embroidery calls for great care . There must not be even a single sloppy stitch.
sentences.cn: 刺绣要求很高, 一针也不能马虎.

sentences.en: He castigated the secretaries for their sloppy job of filing.
sentences.cn: 由于秘书们档案工作搞得马虎草率,他严厉地斥责了他们.

sentences.en: He disillusioned his fans by his sloppy play.
sentences.cn: 他草率的表演使他的崇拜者大失所望.

sentences.en: He has little patience for sloppy work from colleagues.
sentences.cn: 他对同事们草草敷衍的工作鲜有耐心。

sentences.en: His language is disjointed and sloppy.
sentences.cn: 他的语言支离破碎，混乱不堪。

sentences.en: I thought it was disgusting to be kissed by a sloppy dog.
sentences.cn: 我认为,让一只邋邋遢遢的狗亲吻真叫人恶心.

sentences.en: If you do such sloppy work again, I promise I'll fail you.
sentences.cn: 要是下次作业你再马马虎虎, 我话说在头里,可要给你打不及格了.

sentences.en: It appalled me to see such sloppy work.
sentences.cn: 看到这么草率马虎的产品,真叫我厌恶.

sentences.en: It had been snowing and thawing and the streets were sloppy.
sentences.cn: 天一直在下雪,雪又一直在融化,街上泥泞不堪.

sentences.en: It's ideal for people who like a sloppy movie.
sentences.cn: 对于喜欢伤感电影的人来说，这部影片再合适不过了。

sentences.en: Mother constantly picked at him for being sloppy.
sentences.cn: 母亲不断地批评他懒散.

sentences.en: Now , however , he idled, thinking how sloppy the streets would be.
sentences.cn: 而他这时还在闲散度日, 想着街上该有多么泥泞.

words.tran_cn: 粗心地；凌乱地；过于伤感地；感情脆弱地

trans.tran_cn: 懒散的，草率的，稀薄的，多雨的，泥泞的，过于伤感的
trans.tran_en: sloppy clothes are loose-fitting, untidy, or dirty
